      • rotateLeft90

        public static int rotateLeft90(byte[] src,
                               LibIRProcess.ImageRes_t image_res,
                               CommonParams.IRPROCSRCFMTType input_fmt,
                               byte[] dst)
        图像向左旋转90度【Rotate the frame left 90 degree】
        目前支持Y14和RGB图像格式【Currently supports Y14 and RGB image formats】
        Parameters:
        src - source image frame
        image_res - imput image resulution, detail see ImageRes_t
        input_fmt - imput image format, detail see irproc_src_fmt_t
        CommonParams.IRPROCSRCFMTType#IRPROC_SRC_FMT_Y14,
        CommonParams.IRPROCSRCFMTType#IPROC_SRC_FMT_YUV422,
        CommonParams.IRPROCSRCFMTType#IRPROC_SRC_FMT_YUV444,
        CommonParams.IRPROCSRCFMTType#IRPROC_SRC_FMT_RGB888,
        CommonParams.IRPROCSRCFMTType#IRPROC_SRC_FMT_BGR888,
        CommonParams.IRPROCSRCFMTType#IRPROC_SRC_FMT_ARGB8888
        dst - [out] destination frame after rotate
        Returns:
        see LibIRProcess.IrporcResult

      • convertY14MapToYuyvPseudocolor

        public static int convertY14MapToYuyvPseudocolor(byte[] image_y14,
                                                 long pix_num,
                                                 CommonParams.PseudoColorType colorType,
                                                 byte[] out_yuv)
        单光伪彩 Y14图像映射成YUYV伪彩模式【Y14 array map to YUV422 pseudocolor array】
        目前仅支持Y14模式【Currently only supports Y14 mode】
        参考固件机芯方式实现，see IRCMD.setPseudoColor(CommonParams.PreviewPathChannel, CommonParams.PseudoColorType)
        Parameters:
        image_y14 - source image frame with Y14 format
        pix_num - pixel number of whole frame
        colorType - pseudo color type during
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_1,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_3,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_4,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_5,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_6,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_7,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_8 ,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_9,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_10 ,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_11,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_12 部分模组(如P2)上不支持PSEUDO_12伪彩
        out_yuv - [out] destination frame after pseudo color mapping
        Returns:
        see LibIRProcess.IrporcResult

      • convertYuyvMapToARGBPseudocolor

        public static int convertYuyvMapToARGBPseudocolor(byte[] image_yuv422,
                                                  long pix_num,
                                                  CommonParams.PseudoColorType colorType,
                                                  byte[] out)
        单光伪彩 yuv422数据获取ARGB伪彩 YUV422 array map to argb8888 pseudocolor array

        设置伪彩，软件方式实现 参考固件机芯方式实现，see IRCMD.setPseudoColor(CommonParams.PreviewPathChannel, CommonParams.PseudoColorType)

        Parameters:
        image_yuv422 - yuv422数据
        pix_num - pixel number of whole frame
        colorType - pseudo color type during
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_1,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_3,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_4,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_5,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_6,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_7,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_8 ,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_9,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_10 ,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_11,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorType#PSEUDO_12 部分模组(如P2)上不支持PSEUDO_12伪彩
        out - [out] argb destination frame after pseudo color mapping
        Returns:
        see LibIRProcess.IrporcResult

      • convertYuyvMapToARGBPseudocolor

        public static int convertYuyvMapToARGBPseudocolor(byte[] image_yuv422,
                                                  long pix_num,
                                                  CommonParams.PseudoColorUsbDualType colorType,
                                                  byte[] out)
        双光伪彩 yuv422数据获取ARGB伪彩 YUV422 array map to argb8888 pseudocolor array

        设置伪彩，软件方式实现 参考固件机芯方式实现，see IRCMD.setPseudoColor(CommonParams.PreviewPathChannel, CommonParams.PseudoColorType)

        Parameters:
        image_yuv422 - yuv422数据
        pix_num - pixel number of whole frame
        colorType - pseudo color type during
        CommonParams.PseudoColorUsbDualType#WHITE_HOT_MODE,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorUsbDualType#BLACK_HOT_MODE,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorUsbDualType#RAINBOW_MODE,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorUsbDualType#IRONBOW_MODE,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorUsbDualType#AURORA_MODE,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorUsbDualType#JUNGLE_MODE,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorUsbDualType#GLORY_HOT_MODE ,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorUsbDualType#MEDICAL_MODE,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorUsbDualType#NIGHT_MODE ,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorUsbDualType#SEPIA_MODE,
        CommonParams.PseudoColorUsbDualType#RED_HOT_MODE
        out - [out] argb destination frame after pseudo color mapping
        Returns:
        see LibIRProcess.IrporcResult

      • convertYuyvMapToARGBCustomPseudocolor

        public static int convertYuyvMapToARGBCustomPseudocolor(byte[] image_yuv422,
                                                        long pix_num,
                                                        int[][] pseudo_color,
                                                        byte[] out)
        yuv422数据获取ARGB伪彩,使用自定义伪彩 YUV422 array map to argb8888 pseudocolor array

        设置伪彩，软件方式实现 参考固件机芯方式实现，see IRCMD.setPseudoColor(CommonParams.PreviewPathChannel, CommonParams.PseudoColorType)

        Parameters:
        image_yuv422 - yuv422数据
        pix_num - pixel number of whole frame
        pseudo_color - 自定义伪彩表
        out -
        Returns:
        see LibIRProcess.IrporcResult

                                                    CommonParams.PseudoColorTypeM2 colorType,
                                                    byte[] out)

        m2的伪彩特殊，有定制需求，需要单独处理

        Parameters:
        image_yuv422 - yuv422数据
        pix_num -
        colorType -
        out -
        Returns:
